Item.Value: [Text:Oh! Uhm... Hello there. I'm $Character_1$, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sorry, but I'm busy right now... Take care.]
[Text:Oh. Hello, $Name$! How are you? I'm just going for a walk. I thought i might try to pick some reagents for mother. If I can remember what it was she needed anyway...]
[Text:I love Spring, don't you? Everything is waking up after a long sleep, just aching to grow and change.]
[Text:For me? Oh no, you shouldn't have!]
[Text:Oh! No, I can't... I couldn't.. Are you sure? A-Alright then! Thank you so much!]
[Text:Are you sure? I guess I can join you for an adventure today.]
[Text:Sorry... I've got things to do today. Maybe later?]
[Text:Most people don't like being out in the rain, but it's never bothered me. Even when I was young, mother had to run after me with a raincoat.]
[Text:Would you like to come with me for a walk in the rain sometime? No one else will, but I think it'd be fun.]
[Text:There's a lot of snow today, isn't there? Mother says there's magic in the snow, but... I'm only good with warmer magic.]
